problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): I listened to a young man talking to an older man the other day in the park. The young man was trying to help the older one to remember some details about a wedding they were both at a few years ago, but sadly it wasn't going very well.
Question: Who has trouble remembering things?
ans0: The young man
ans1: Not known
ans2: The older man
